Describe your product Weight (10 Characters) Enter GSM value Click here to add upto 3 images You can add upto 3 images only Made to order //Cluster description Maniabandha in Cuttack is known for single weft ikat weaving - particularly the “khandua patta” woven for Lord Jagnath. A coastal village of Odisha, on banks of Brahmani river, Gopalpur is a Tussar weave cluster. Part of Nellore district of Andhra, Venktagiri is famous for fine handloom cotton and silk saris, dupattas. A district in Assam, on the banks of Brahmaputra river, Kamrup is the leading eri silk cluster of India. Situated on north bank of Brahmaputra in Assam, Nalbari specialises in weave of mulberry silk; while cotton, eri and zari yarns are also used. Dimapur, Phek region weavers now weave contemporary textiles in thick cotton for home textiles, jackets, bags.. Awaiting payment confirmation Check advance payment receipt View View & Approve Payment Approve Advance Payment by Buyer Reject Payment Approve Advance Payment Payment Receipt "Amount to be paid as per PI : " Once you approve it, the product stage cannot be reverted.\nKindly make sure to check your account balance is reflected with\nthe amount. Best practice is to check with your bank,\nor in bank statement from authorised bank sources. *Double tap to zoom Awaiting Confirmation Start Production stage You have to update the status every 48hrs to avoid escalation Mark as still in progress Mark as complete and move to next stage 8 hrs to avoid escalation View Receipt TransactionActivity Search by Enquiry ID Your Transactions View Invoice Filter transactions by : All PI ID Payment ID Tax Invoice ID Challan ID English Hindi Orders Start this stage You have to update the status every \n 48 hours to avoid escalation Mark as still in progress Mark as completed and move to next stage You have to update the status every \n8 hours to avoid escalation Chats Search chat by enquiryId \tChange request initiated Disable change request Change request is not applicable for in stock Products. Please Note:\nChange request may be accepted or rejected subjective to the feasibility of the change by artisan.If accepted, there may be a change in final amount and hence the pro forma invoice. You can only submit this change request once.Be sure about the change requested before submitting.\n\n This change request may or may not be accepted. You can raise change request if rejected by first discussing with artisan in advance to avoid any rejection. Change request disabled. Please Note:\nChange request is only one time facility to buyer for their ongoing order with you.\nDo consider with checking box if able to accept the request. If you accept this change request, the buyer shall not be able to raise another change request.\n\n Want to discuss more? Post change request process Please update the\nQuality Check\nform & send to\nproceed before moving\nto next stage Fill in QC form Send Quality check for\t Select an option\ No Quality Check Available. Quality Check Generate new PI post CR Create & Send Tax Invoice Tax invoice Fill in Tax invoice for this order Rate per unit(or metre) Previous Total amount\n(as per PI) Advance payment received\n(Previously as per PI) Delivery charges\n(Freight charges) Upload delivery receipt\n(non-mandatory) Final Amount Amount to be paid\n(Final Amount - Advance Payment) Date of dispatch Revised ETA\n(if required) Swipe to generate Tax invoice preview Upload your delivery receipt Upload delivery receipt Make sure you send the correct delivery receipt.\nAlso make sure the attached document is clear and readable\nwith the LR number and amount. Upload receipt Upload Final Payment Receipt Delivery Challan This is a preview Download this invoice pdf Quantity Currency Net amount to be paid Approve Final Payment View rating provide by buyer Rating by buyer Response Review & Rating Review Your Experience Average Score Because Your Words Matter!! If you like it or you feel that you want to share. We would like to hear from you! "Declaration by AE- I, hereby certify from my end that all the processes have been Monitored & Supervised under my guidence and any issue in Quality Certified by me in person or my staff in charge is liable to be discussed with me directly on mail. Once the goods received at your doorsteps, we will not be liable for quality issue if informed after 72 hrs of receipts. " Legal Disclaimer //facebook sdk 717798432467327 fb717798432467327 //temp fb sdk Mark Order Dispatched Check Delivery Receipt Buyer Brand Dispatch Mark as dispatched ETA Dispatch Date Eh! Problem? Raise a concern Uh Oh!!! Please let us know what went wrong so that we can take this up. 2 days to report a problem. Select if any of the options are relevant Make sure to choose the right option or else choose \'Others\'\n& simply describe your problem in comments below. Description of the problem (Mandatory) Type here... Please note: Hand made products are prone to few minor defects, which makes it unique to the style & tradition of the culture. Also it is a mark of authenticity. We humbly request you to respect & trust the artisans on the same before raising any concerns Submit Sure? If you want to review before\nsending, you can still do it. Please note that, if the order is beyond repair or the\nissue is not addressable, we would escalate it to the\nadmin. The final decision shall be an agreement. Yes, submit! Upload photos (IN CHAT) for reference. Please acknowledge the raised concern to avoid escalations. Please reply before 48hrs for raised concern Description of the fault Note Remarks by Artisan Entrepreneur Add your comment View Raised Concern Please bear, it may take upto 48hrs to\naddress and respond to your raised concern. We\'re glad that your concern is\nresolved on mutual agreement. Mark Resolved View defect & response Rate & review this order Great job! Order Recreation "Order under recreation.\nKindly keep updating the buyer\nabout the status of product over chat " Mark Order dispatched after recreation Are you sure you want to recreate this order? Confirm Order under Recreation\nKindly refer chats for regular updates and\nin-case of any inconvenience, feel free\nto escalate the issue over chat View Details \tGo to enquiry Click up to close Congrats!\nYou are about to mark this order complete.
